data.title: The Portland Chapter of the Awesome Foundation presents... Do More Awesome!
data.meta_description: A Fix-It Fair workshop... at home!
data.text:
About this workshop

Have an idea to make Portland more Awesome? Awesome Foundation Portland is made up of awesome individuals just like you who want to see Portland become even awesomer than it already is!

We award a $1,000 grant every other month to a group or individual who is making an impact in our community. If you're interested in applying or learning more this session will let you know what we will fund, what won't fund and how to improve your chances of being funded.

Have questions you want answered? Email them to fixitfair@portlandoregon.gov and we'll make sure they're covered!

More about Awesome Foundation Portland

We want the artists, the leaders, and the dreamers of our great city to prove it. And we regularly give away $1,000 grants to help make that happen!
